<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Uncanny Bombs](/Feats.aspx?ID=5793) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=812" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 68 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Far Lobber](/Feats.aspx?ID=5763)

</column>

---

You lob bombs unerringly, despite obstructions or distance. When you throw an [alchemical](/Traits.aspx?ID=528) item with the [bomb](/Traits.aspx?ID=548) trait, its [range increment](/Rules.aspx?ID=2195) increases to 60 feet, you reduce any circumstance bonus to the target's AC from [cover](/Rules.aspx?ID=2372) by 1, and you automatically succeed at the [flat check](/Rules.aspx?ID=333) when targeting a [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=62) creature.
name: Uncanny Bombs
